addons.name: DirectBankTransfer
addons.description: DirectBankTransfer is a system where the guest can transfer an amount of money to Admin's Bank Account. and upload the necessary documenta so admin can approve the request of the guest

addons.name: Paypal
addons.description: Whether you’re building an online, mobile or in-person payment solution, you’ll find the resources you need to test and go live with PayPal.

addons.name: Paystack
addons.description: Paystack is a Nigerian financial technology company that offers payment processing services to businesses and was acquired by Irish-American financial services company Stripe for $200M in 2020. Its headquarters is located in Lagos,

addons.name: Stripe
addons.description: Stripe, Inc. is an Irish-American financial services and software as a service company dual-headquartered in South San Francisco, California, United States and Dublin, Ireland

addons.name: Flutterwave
addons.description: Flutterwave is a Nigerian fintech company that provides a payment infrastructure for global merchants and payment service providers across the continent.
